rukus.text: 37|75|Arau arasye nuhe amaka ahbana karaichila, eteke (coraa) ami kimana uttamabharae samharai jana'ichilo
37|76|te'omka arau te'omra paraiyalabargaka ami mahasankatara paraa ud'dhara karaichilo.
37|77|Arau te'omra bansadhara sakalake'i ami arasista raakhichilo
37|78|arau ami parabartisakalara majata te'omra sukhyati raakhi dicho.
37|79|Samagra srstira majata nuhara prati santi barsita ha'omka.
37|80|Niscaya ami e'idarae'i satkarmasila sakalaka puraskrta karao.
37|81|Niscaya te'om achila amara mumina bandasakalara an'yatama.
37|82|Tara pichata ami anabilakaka duba'i maraichilo.
37|83|Arau niscaya ibraahima te'omra anusarai sakalarae'i antarbhukta.
37|84|Smarana karaa, yetiya te'om nija pratipalakara ocarata bisud'dhacitte upasthita haichila
37|85|yetiya te'om te'omra pitrka arau te'omra sampradayaka sudhichila, ‘tomaloke kihara ibadata karaicha
37|86|‘tomaloke allahara paraibarte alika upasyaborake bicaraa neki
37|87|‘tente bisbajagatara pratipalaka samparke tomalokara dharana ki’
37|88|tara pichata te'om taraasamuhara pine drstipata karaile.
37|89|Arau ka’le, ‘niscaya ma'i asustha’.
37|90|Tara pichata sihamte prsthapradarsana karai te'omra paraa amtarai ga’la.
37|91|Tara pichata te'om ca'iciti sihamtara upasyaborara ocarata ga’la, arau ka’le, ‘tomaloke nokhoraa kiya’
37|92|‘ki ha’la tomalokara, katha nokoraa kiya’
37|93|tara pichata te'om sihamtara oparata sajorae aghata karaile.
37|94|Tetiya (ghurai ahi) manuhe te'omra phale dhapali melile.
37|95|Te'om ka’le, ‘tomaloke se'iborara upasana karaa neki, yiboraka tomaloke nije'i nirmana karaa’
37|96|‘athaca allahe'i srsti karaiche tomalokaka arau tomaloke yi taiyara karaa se'itorao teraemi srsti karaiche’.
37|97|Sihamte ka’le, ‘iyara babe eta sthapana taiyara karaa, tara pichata iyaka jbalanta ju'ita niksepa karaa’.
37|98|E'idarae'i sihamte te'omra biraud'dhe cakraantara sankalpa karaichila; kintu ami sihamtaka sampurnaraupe paraabhuta karai dilo.
37|99|Te'om ka’le, ‘ma'i mora pratipalakara ocaralai gai acho, niscaya teraemi moka hidayata karaiba
37|100|‘he mora raba! Moka ejana satkarmaparaayana santana dana karaa’.
37|101|Tara pichata ami te'omka ejana sahisnu putrara susambada dilo.

37|102|Eteke yetiya sisuto te'omra pitrra saite calaphuraa karaa arasthata upanita ha’la, tetiya ibraahime ka’le, ‘he mora cenehara putra! Ma'i saponata dekhilo ye, ma'i tomaka yabeha karai acho, etiya koraacona tomara abhimata ki’? Putra'i ka’le, ‘he mora pitr! Apuni yi adesapraapta haiche se'itorae'i karaka. Allahara icchata apuni moka dhairyasila sakalara antarbhukta paba’.
37|103|Eteke te'omloka ubhaye yetiya anugatya prakasa karaile arau ibraahime te'omra putraka talamura karai suraa'i la’le
37|104|tetiya ami te'omka mati ka’lo, ‘he ibraahima
37|105|‘tumi dekhuna saponara adesa samca'i palana karaila! Niscaya e'idarae'i ami satkarmasila sakalaka puraskrta karao’.
37|106|Niscaya e'ito achila eta suspasta paraiksa.
37|107|Arau ami te'omka mukta karailo eta maha kurabanira binimayata.
37|108|Arau ami te'omra babe parabartisakalara majata sunama-sukhyati raakhi dicho.
37|109|Santi barsita ha'omka ibraahimara oparata.
37|110|E'idarae'i ami satkarmasilasakalaka puraskrta karao.
37|111|Niscaya te'om achila amara mumina bandasakalara an'yatama
37|112|arau ami te'omka ichahakbara susambada dichilo, te'om achila ejana nabi, satkarmasilasakalara an'yatama.

37|113|Arau ami ibraahimara oparata barakata dana karaichilo arau ichahakbara oparato; arau te'omloka ubhayerae bansadharasakalara majata achila kichumana satkarmasila arau kichumana achila nijara prati spasta atyacarai.
